craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: Contributing to a kill grants +25 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 2).

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: The holder's spells and basic attacks do 20% bonus true damage. if the target has more than 1750 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 80%

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: 45% healing from spell damage. Overhealing with this item now generates a shield (max 400 Health).

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: After first casting their spell, the holder's basic attacks restore 18% of their maximum mana on-hit

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs: Wearer revives with 400 HP

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 45% of the damage dealt.

craf.name: ZekesHerald
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs: [Unique] The holder gains 20% bonus critical strike damage, and 100% critical hit chance.

craf.name: RapidFirecannon
craf.add_attrs: +200% Range and holder’s attacks can’t miss.

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Basic Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. No stacking limit.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 85 magic damage to 3/4/5 enemies. Additional 85 True Damage if the target has a shield or is CC’d.

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 25 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

craf.name: ZzRotPortal
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1500/2250/3000 ★ Health aries to continue the fight.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 75% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: Wearer's Spell Power stat is amplified by 50%

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 200 magic damage.

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs: Shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250 / 300 / 375 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 40% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs: Holder’s spells can crit and holder gains +30% Critical Strike Damage.

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs: [Unique] Sets holder's mana to 20 after each cast.

craf.name: FrozenHeart
craf.add_attrs: Angrenzende Gegner verlieren 50% Angriffstempo. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow)

craf.name: Chalice
craf.add_attrs: At start of combat, the holder and their left and right neighbors gain 30 AP for 20 seconds.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs: At the begining of Each planning phase, gain one: Deal +45% more damage / Grants 45% healing from damage done by both abilities and basic attacks.

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100 / 140 / 200 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 second maximum). Scales with wearer’s Star Level.

craf.name: SwordBreaker
craf.add_attrs: 33% chance to disarm for 3 seconds

craf.name: RedBuff
craf.add_attrs: Gains 10% max hp true damage over 4 seconds on hit in addition to its burn. And reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

craf.name: Shroud
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 30% until they cast.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs: Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%

craf.name: Zephyr
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs: [UNIQUE] The wearer is immute to croud control for the first 10 seconds of combat

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: +600 Additional Health.

craf.name: Backhand
craf.add_attrs: Start combat with a spell shield. Stun the champion that breaks it for 4 sec

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs: Each planning phase, fetch two temporary items, quality based upon your player level. [Consumes Three item Slots]

spec.name: Infiltrator
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Infiltrator trait.

spec.name: BattlecastArmor
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Battlecast trait.

spec.name: Starguardian
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Star Guardian trait.

spec.name: RebelMedal
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Rebel trait.

spec.name: Celestial
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

spec.name: Protector
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Protector trait.

spec.name: Darkstar
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Dark Star trait.
